body.description: SheaMoisture Even and Radiant Daily Exfoliating Toner Pads are made for melanin-rich skin to help clear clogged pores and remove dead skin cells. Infused with natural Raw Honey, these gentle face pads feature an alcohol-free formula to help clear clogged pores and remove dead skin cells. These daily face pads combine an exfoliator and a toner in a single-use pad. Use in the AM and PM. Use as step 2, following Even and Radiant Cleansing Balm. Start with clean, dry skin. Gently swipe one pad across the face and neck, avoiding the eye area. Allow to fully dry before following with Even and Radiant Dark Spot Correcting Serum, and ending with Even and Radiant Daily Face Lotion during the AM or Even and Radiant Night Cream during the PM. SheaMoisture Daily Exfoliating Toner Pads are part of the Even and Radiant skincare collection, which helps to visibly reduce the appearance of dark spots and post-acne spots while helping to restore skin's natural tone. Our skin care products are formulated with no parabens, no mineral oil, no phthalates, no fragrance, no petrolatum, and no animal testing. SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and an entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap, and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa. With every purchase, you show support of our mission to reinvest back in our communities. Ethically traded ingredients, sustainably produced. Tested on the Tucker family for four generations. Never on animals.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: These gentle, yet effective, single-use exfoliating toner pads, blended with natural Raw Honey, help clear clogged pores and remove dead skin cells. The alcohol-free formula helps reduce shine without stripping skin.

INFUSED WITH NATURAL INGREDIENTS SheaMoisture Even & Radiant Collection, blended with natural Raw Honey, helps to visibly reduce the appearance of dark spots and post-acne spots while helping to restore skin's natural tone. OUR PROMISE Formulated with no parabens, no mineral oil, no phthalates, no fragrance, no petrolatum, and no animal testing. TRIED, TRUE & CRUELTY FREE Tested on our family for four generations. Never on animals. SUSTAINABLY PRODUCED GOODNESS With every purchase you show support of our mission to reinvest back in our communities.

SHEAMOISTURE EVEN & RADIANT DARK SPOT CORRECTING SERUM, 1 OZ SHEAMOISTURE EVEN & RADIANT 3-IN-1 MELTING CLEANSING BALM, 3.2 OZ SHEAMOISTURE EVEN & RADIANT DAILY FACE LOTION, 3.2 OZ Main Benefit This serum helps to visibly reduce the appearance of dark spots and post-acne spots while helping to restore skin's natural tone. This cleansing balm melts into your skin to remove makeup, oil and impurities while moisturizing your skin. Use this face lotion every morning after cleansing and toning for radiant skin that you and everybody will notice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These toner pads are gentle on the skin. I’ve used many different toners since my acne started and they were all drying and irritating to the skin. These pads do not only exfoliate the skin but they moisturize it as well. I will definitely be purchasing again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly really good, but small
reviews.reviewText: I didn't expect much from this brand in terms of facial skincare, but lo and behold it's pretty good.The pads are textured and moist but not too wet. They exfoliate well without leaving my skin feeling stripped. The amount of dirt removed is incredible, and yet there is no irritation afterwards. My skin actually feels moisturized afterwards, but not greasy or sticky.I only wish the pads were bigger. They are tiny in comparison to my other pads, and even in comparison to the jar size. I often feel like I need to use two to get the same amount of cleaning as my other face pads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toner pads
reviews.reviewText: I liked these. They have plenty of product on them and enough liquid to use few more times once you run out of pads. I put mine in the face creams fridge and they are nice and chilled. Feels great on the skin.They did not make me break out. They clean great! Whatever residual make up I had after cleansing products, these pads removed it all. Gentle enough for the neck too.Overall great product.I am 33 y.o. Prone to break outs skin. Just fyiIf you liked the review please press button helpful below the review so I know what to include in next reviews ☺️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small Pads. Made with Bee product
reviews.reviewText: 3.12.22~ The pads are small.More the size of a cotton round than a face pad.But at this price, suppose that's to be expected.The downside with a small pad is, if you have sun damage to your whole face,it's only enough for a few spots not face.Once you do cheeks & want to swipe neck, the pad is a ball.Does it work?Well, I use other products so hard to tell.The slight pad exfoliation seems to help & face feels very hydrated after.What I don't like, and didn't know at time of click was, this has bee products in it.Even though 'Shea Moisture' is traditionally Cruelty Free, using bees is not my thing.So my Eco self is conflicted & don't want to uspet the creatures that make our food.The bee product plus the small pads would make this a pass for me.Also a weird smell I can't identify & not a fan of.But at the price point, it is a nice option to smooth texture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not for everyone
reviews.reviewText: Gave me a bad reaction on my face. Will not use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I am a longtime fan of SheaMoisture products and I was so excited to see them here on Amazon. SheaMoisture has a reputation for good quality products and these face pads are no different. They are great for exfoliating the skin and I am excited to use them in combination with the entire line of SheaMoisture skin products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using these daily for a bit now. I just love them. Easy and quick to use versus a cotton pad and a toner. They make my face feel refreshed and clean. I don’t feel like they are too harsh on my skin and leave a really nice moisturized feeling. It has a light scent that vanishes once in use. The pads are very moist and the container has held them moister in well. One of my favorite items in my skin care line up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves a nice dewy look on your face
reviews.reviewText: Very moist pads, enough to continue using the product on your neck and chest if needed. You can feel the exfoliating when you’re rubbing (b/c I rubbed too hard). You can see the dirt on the cleansing pad. It would be great for daily exfoliating and bringing color to your cheeks.The ingredients initially feels itchy on my skin but it settles in after it dries. It leaves a nice dewy look on your face. I very much like this daily use on my skin care.
